location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The file’s single item of correspondence (f 2) is followed by a set of file notes (f 3).

Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 4; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file comprises a single item of correspondence, a confidential note from the Staff Officer (Intelligence) Persian Gulf (Lieutenant RNVR [Royal Naval Volunteer Reserve] I Setter), addressed to all Persian Gulf Reporting Officers, dated 12 April 1946, announcing his taking up of duties from 3 April 1946 (f 2). The file notes (f 3) record discussion amongst Agency staff in response to the note, which suggest that the Political Agent becomes ‘NRO’ when SOIO (Staff Officer Intelligence?) leaves Bahrain.
